component.text: Click on the equipment to view the definition.

• Small businesses with 20 to 250 employees
  • Able to support forwarding rates of 8.8Gbps to 24Gbps
  • Supports web-based management only
  • Available with Fast Ethernet and Gigabit Ethernet connectivity
  • Support port densities to 24 10/100 ports (PoE optional) or 12 10/100/1000 ports

• Entry-level enterprise, medium-sized, and branch office networks
  • Forwarding rates between 16Gbps to 32Gbps
  • Cisco CLI and web-based management
  • Advanced LAN features:
– Multilayered switching
– QoS
– ACLs
  • Fast Ethernet and Gigabit Ethernet connectivity
  • Up to 48 10/100 ports or 10/100/1000 ports (No PoE)
  • Dual purpose gigabit uplinks

• Small enterprise LAN access or branch-office converged network environments
  • Forwarding rates between 32Gbps to 128Gbps
  • Cisco CLI and web-based management
  • Advanced LAN features:
– QoS
– ACLs
  • Fast Ethernet and Gigabit Ethernet connectivity
  • Up to 48 10/100/1000 ports plus 4 SFP ports
  • 10 GbE connectivity – Catalyst 3560-E
  • 24 - 15.4 watt PoE ports or 48 - 7.3 watt PoE ports

• Midsize organizations and enterprise branch offices
  • Forwarding rates between 32Gbps to 128Gbps
  • Cisco StackWise technology
  • Cisco CLI and web-based management
  • Advanced LAN features:
– QoS
– ACLsFast Ethernet and Gigabit Ethernet connectivity
  • Up to 48 10/100/1000 ports plus 4 SFP ports
  • 10 GbE connectivity – Catalyst 3750-E
  • 24 - 15.4W PoE ports or 48 - 7.3W PoE ports
The Cisco Catalyst 4500 – access, distribution and core level switch:

• Midsize organizations and enterprise branch offices
  • Forwarding rates up to 136Gbps
  • Modular 3, 6, 7, and 10 slot chassis
  • Cisco CLI and web-based management
  • Advanced LAN features:
– Multilayer switching
– Hardware assisted IP routing
– QoS
– ACLs
  • 384 Fast Ethernet, Gigabit with 10 GbE fiber uplink ports (PoE optional)
  • Dual, hot-swappable internal power supplies
The Cisco Catalyst 4948 – specialty access level switch:

• Optimized for data centers
  • 96 Gbps with a 72 Mpps forwarding rate
  • Cisco CLI and web-based management
  • Advanced LAN features:
– Multilayer switching
– QoS
– ACLs
  • 48 10/100/1000 ports with 4 SFP ports or 48 10/100/1000 ports with 2 10GbE ports
  • Dual, hot-swappable internal power supplies
  • Hot-swappable fan trays
The Cisco Catalyst 6500 – access, distribution and core level switch:

• Midsize organizations and enterprise branch offices
  • Forwarding rates up to 720Gbps
  • Modular 3, 4, 6, 9, and 13 slot chassis
  • Cisco CLI and web-based management
  • Advanced LAN features:
– LAN/WAN service modules
– Multilayer switching
– Hardware assisted IP routing
– QoS
– ACLs
  • 1152 10/100 ports, 577 10/100/1000 ports, 410 SFP Gigabit Ethernet ports, or 64 10Gbe ports
  • 420 - 15.4W PoE devices
  • Dual, hot-swappable internal power supplies
